items.title: Introduction to Model Context Protocol
items.description: Official introduction to MCP by Anthropic. Learn how MCP enables seamless integration between LLMs and external data sources through a standardized protocol.

items.title: Building MCP Servers
items.description: Comprehensive guide to building your own MCP servers. Covers architecture, implementation patterns, and best practices for connecting AI systems to data sources.

items.title: MCP Quickstart Guide
items.description: Get started quickly with MCP. Step-by-step tutorial for implementing your first MCP integration with practical code examples.

items.title: What is RAG? - AWS Guide
items.description: Comprehensive overview of Retrieval-Augmented Generation. Explains how RAG enhances LLMs by combining retrieval systems with generative models for more accurate, contextual responses.

items.title: Building Production RAG Systems
items.description: Deep dive into production RAG architectures. Covers vector databases, embedding strategies, chunking techniques, and evaluation frameworks for real-world applications.

items.title: OpenAI Fine-tuning Guide
items.description: Official guide to fine-tuning OpenAI models. Learn when to fine-tune vs prompt engineering, data preparation, training best practices, and evaluation techniques.

items.title: Understanding LoRA and QLoRA
items.description: Introduction to efficient fine-tuning methods. Explains Low-Rank Adaptation (LoRA) and Quantized LoRA for training large models with limited resources.

items.title: Anthropic's Responsible Scaling Policy
items.description: Anthropic's framework for managing risks of increasingly capable AI systems. Covers AI Safety Levels (ASL), security standards, and deployment measures.

items.title: Google's AI Principles
items.description: Google's framework for responsible AI development. Addresses fairness, accountability, privacy, and societal impact considerations in AI product development.

items.title: AI Safety Resources - Partnership on AI
items.description: Curated collection of AI safety and ethics resources. Includes case studies, frameworks, and guidelines for building trustworthy AI systems.

items.title: Anthropic Prompt Engineering Guide
items.description: Comprehensive guide to prompt engineering for Claude. Covers techniques like chain-of-thought, few-shot learning, and system prompts with practical examples.

items.title: OpenAI Prompt Engineering Guide
items.description: Best practices for crafting effective prompts for GPT models. Includes strategies for clarity, context provision, and output formatting.

items.title: DeepLearning.AI Prompt Engineering Course
items.description: Free course by Andrew Ng and OpenAI on prompt engineering for developers. Covers LLM best practices, summarizing, inferring, transforming text, and building chatbots.

items.title: Evaluating LLMs - DeepLearning.AI
items.description: Framework for evaluating large language models. Covers accuracy metrics, safety evaluations, bias detection, and human evaluation best practices.

items.title: OpenAI Evals Framework
items.description: Open-source framework for evaluating LLMs. Provides tools and methodologies for systematic model performance assessment across diverse tasks.

items.title: Google's AI/ML Product Management Resources
items.description: Collection of resources for AI product managers. Includes case studies, frameworks, and best practices from Google's product teams.

items.title: Lenny's Newsletter - AI PM Interviews
items.description: Interviews with top AI product managers from leading companies. Learn from real practitioners about building and shipping AI products.

items.title: AI Alignment Forum
items.description: Community hub for AI alignment research and discussion. Features research papers, discussions, and updates on alignment approaches from leading researchers.

items.title: Anthropic's Constitutional AI Paper
items.description: Research paper introducing Constitutional AI (CAI). Describes methods for training AI systems to be helpful, harmless, and honest through principle-based approaches.
